issue.title: [C++] CSV date custom parser
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10847](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10847). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When I have a custom date format in CSV I'd like to parse it by adding additional DateParser, equivalent to TimestampParser which may be added to <font color="#001080">timestamp_parsers</font> in <font color="#267f99">ConvertOptions.</font>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10847?focusedCommentId=17624338) by Rok Mihevc (rokm):*
Would [creating custom a parser](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/91e3ac53e2e21736ce6291d73fc37da6fa21259d/cpp/src/arrow/csv/column_builder_test.cc#L423-L439) resolve this?
